basics.name: Dmitry Ivanov
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Saint-Petersburg ➜ Master's in Computer Graphics ➜ UI/Web designer at kudago.com ➜ Montreal ➜ Frontend/Web engineer for TTBA and Amaze ➜ WebGL specialist at Plotly Inc ➜ Frontend at Mobeewave/Apple ➜ Senior Frontend Engineer at Elevenlabs. Versatile professional in computer graphics, UI/Web design, audio/DSP, frontend engineering, with expertise in fintech and mobile payments. Committed to innovation and seeking opportunities in relevant fields.
